summary: An ENB preset made to hide LOD with heavy fog, bloom, and blur.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][u]This preset uses heavy fog and static depth of field to hide ugly lod and object pop in. Most people will find this to be too much to play with, but I'm uploading for the few who may use it.[/u][/size]

[size=3]• Lots of bloom

[/size][size=3]• Lots of blur

[/size][size=3]• Lots of sun
[/size]

[size=4][u]How to change contrast and saturation: 

[/u][/size]Hit shift+enter while in game to bring up the enb menu. In the upper right side of the menu you will see the shaders window, drop down the enbeffect box. There you will find saturation values for all times of the day, as well as contrast, exposure, and more. These are very easy to mess with and only take a few minutes to get exactly what you want. 



[size=4][u]Use this to customize night eye:[/u][/size]

• [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50731/?]Enhanced ENB Night Eye [/url][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50731/?]


[/url][size=3]Big [/size][size=3]thanks to nexus user [/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/451830]scegielski[/url], he is responsible for enb night eye and fixing up a previous enb preset (which was the base for this enb)
[/size][/center]
author: Bretton
